title: Looking for Aram friends.
body: Just did my ranked provs landed in gold 3, but I mostly just want to do Aram games to farm IP so I can get more champs on this account. So if anybody wants to do Aram games, feel free to add me.

replies.body:
Hey friend!

Me and my friend love rolling some arams, and I might even duo with you at some point if you're keen. Plat V atm.

Hit me up at MadCast MrEpic in game. I'll be on later today.

Hi there! If you're looking for people to play ranked or normals even ARAM you can go here https://ethereal-gaming.com/ we're a great community of friendly helpful gamers always looking for new people to join for games!

Look forward to hearing from you,

Gwazy.
